TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Lalapa, title = Lalapa, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lalapa} }

S.FORM: Lalapa, cacay a ngangan. u lalapa ku katalalan a kamu nu amisay a Amis . u lalapa a tademaw maylayay musakakawaw. u lalapa a tademaw atekakay ku wayway.
Lalapa, cacay a ngangan. o lalapa ko katalalan a kamo no amisay a Amis . o lalapa a tademaw maylayay mosakakawaw. o lalapa a tademaw atekakay ko wayway.
